Not found any image yet which showing my "that much!!!" too enough

item.title: How much you like Half-Life?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Frozen Cham, you may need to either lurk more or create a habit where you always look at the date of the last post before posting something yourself.

03-01-10, 15:30 #42
sersoft

Today, 06:58 #43
Frozen Cham

See the problem? Oh wait, not many folks realize the date structure is DD/MM/YY and not MM/DD/YY

anyway. Just be careful or else you may be burned to a crisp round these parts.

item.title: How much you like Half-Life?
item.dc:creator: Crikulus
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

Halo is better.

hahahaha, oh man, that’s funny!! Good one, feedz da fanboy-trollz haha

EDIT: Yeah, and I really like half life!! I’ve played HL1, HL2 + episodes countless times!

Read full topic

item.title: How much you like Half-Life?
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
Hanzales:

Especially with my limited vocabulary :retard:

I’m not sure why HL1 is the best game ever for me. Maybe it’s because in '98 everything was so great. Big nostalgia. I remember we discussed our progress in game with friends in a pub (club) and I said:
[COLOR=‘SeaGreen’]“Yeah I am at the rail right now…”
[COLOR=‘RoyalBlue’]“Oh… you didn’t met ninjas yet”
[COLOR=‘SeaGreen’]“What?! There are ninjas too?”
[COLOR=‘RoyalBlue’]“Yep, and tanks and choppers…”
[COLOR=‘SeaGreen’]“hmm… hmm… O.K. last beer fellas, I need go home walk with my dogs”
At the same time… Unreal (with his revolutionary graphics and outdoors) has been moved to the second rail.

Pfft, I bet you never even made it through the pirate-infested pontoon level with the Japanese spider-monkeys.

Read full topic

item.title: How much you like Half-Life?
item.dc:creator: Hanzales
item.description:
Drunkenpanda200:

Ah, speak english very well you do.
I no sound like Yoda, do I?

Anyway, I love the Half-Life series to such an extent that… gah, impossible to describe with our limited vocabulary.

Especially with my limited vocabulary :retard:

I’m not sure why HL1 is the best game ever for me. Maybe it’s because in '98 everything was so great. Big nostalgia. I remember we discussed our progress in game with friends in a pub (club) and I said:
[COLOR=‘SeaGreen’]“Yeah I am at the rail right now…”
[COLOR=‘RoyalBlue’]“Oh… you didn’t met ninjas yet”
[COLOR=‘SeaGreen’]“What?! There are ninjas too?”
[COLOR=‘RoyalBlue’]“Yep, and tanks and choppers…”
[COLOR=‘SeaGreen’]“hmm… hmm… O.K. last beer fellas, I need go home walk with my dogs”
At the same time… Unreal (with his revolutionary graphics and outdoors) has been moved to the second rail.

Read full topic

item.title: How much you like Half-Life?
item.dc:creator: Hanzales
item.description:
Eric Fong:

Fuck you, arsehole, get a life. Don’t fuck with Half-Life!!!

I like Half-life till i die.

Post above me double posted!!!

I had to say something similar… in terms of that it’s not optimal comparison.
Half-Life is not a “bitch”
Half-Life cannot be fucked
But in some way… people can have a orgasm when playing HL

“Nobody fuck with the Jesus” …and with Half-Life either :freeman:

Read full topic

item.title: How much you like Half-Life?
item.dc:creator: Hanzales
item.description:
Hanzales:

Here we have accurate example (which you will not know) how “not perfect language proficiency” can destroy a lot of fun. (I mean my crippled english input/output engine)

I will continue with learning proper english rather then sounds like a retard and just say for sure only -> Thumbs Up <- instead of originally planed reaction with unknown expression result :zip:

I thought I know HL1 so good until I saw speedrun. Damn I feld like a schoolboy then again.

…No … I am retarded. I just accidently Quoted my post and beside this I am failed with delete procedure. Somebody hit me with a crowbar to my head, please…

Read full topic
